mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.res_date, r.res_time, r.cake_id, c.flavor AS cake_flavor, r.cake_size, r.contact FROM reservations r JOIN cakes c ON r.cake_id = c.id ORDER BY r.id DESC
SELECT id, res_date AS resDate, res_time AS resTime, cake_id AS cakeId, cake_size AS cakeSize, contact, note, is_paid AS paid FROM reservations WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT r.id, r.res_date AS resDate, r.res_time AS resTime, r.cake_id AS cakeId, c.flavor AS cakeFlavor, r.cake_size AS cakeSize, r.contact AS contact FROM reservations r JOIN cakes c ON r.cake_id = c.id WHERE r.res_date = CURRENT_DATE() ORDER BY r.res_time ASC

SELECT r.id, r.res_date AS resDate, r.res_time AS resTime, r.cake_id AS cakeId, c.flavor AS cakeFlavor, r.cake_size AS cakeSize, r.contact AS contact FROM reservations r JOIN cakes c ON r.cake_id = c.id ORDER BY r.res_date ASC, r.res_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (res_date, res_time, cake_id, contact, is_paid) VALUES (#{resDate}, #{resTime}, #{cakeId}, #{contact}, #{paid})
